txt.en: Destroy blacksmithing tools at Gazat-fark and Durbángh
Destroying blacksmithing tools would impact the Orcs' equipment supply
You have destroyed the Orcs' blacksmithing tools.
Destroying blacksmithing tools at Gazat-fark and Durbángh would briefly halt the progress of arming Gorgar's forces.\n\nGazat-fark and Durbángh sit at the bottom level of Deepscrave.
You have destroyed the Orcs' blacksmithing tools. Gorgar's forces will be hard-pressed to properly arm their soldiers now.
Destroying blacksmithing tools at Gazat-fark and Durbángh would briefly halt the progress of arming Gorgar's forces.\n\nGazat-fark and Durbángh sit at the bottom level of Deepscrave.
What use is a blacksmith without their tools? Destroying blacksmithing tools at Gazat-fark and Durbángh would briefly halt the progress of arming Gorgar's forces.
What use is a blacksmith without their tools?
